title: Ask HN: Drug continuation after an RCT ends
text: Suppose a new treatment is investigated in a Randomized Clinical Trial and the treatment turns out to be a very effective, life changing medication for a particular illness for a participant.  What happens once the RCT ends in terms of continuing access to that particular drug (that was so effective) for particular patients?  Does anyone have insight on ethical/legal obligations for a patient to continue on with the drug? How can a patient continue on the RCT drug once the RCT ends?

Show HN: A developper friendly (web) comic format
text:
Hey HN

Using two online tools and some HTML/CSS I have been able to create a (web) comic despite the fact that I am conpletely unable to draw.

The first tool is https://www.pixelartcss.com/ which allows me to convert video game tiles to CSS.

The second one is https://www.thecodingfox.com/interactive/pixel-world-editor/ which was kindly made by TheCodingFox for me. It allows to combine the output of pixelartcss on a grid. The ouput is then exported as an HTML file that I can reuse.

As a result the illustrations you can see are actually only css and HTML. The comic does not make use of any images such as ong or jpg.

title: Ask HN: What do you use for writing your CV?

Ask HN: Low Cost Email Automation?
text:
Is there a very low cost or DIY email automation sequence service?

I was using Mail Chimp but they don’t offer automations on the free tier. I purchased Convert kit, but paying $300+ a year for tutorials I give away for free does not make sense.
